actions.command: execute if entity @s[scores={rend_fallen_base_attack=0}] run attribute @s minecraft:generic.attack_damage base set 3

execute at @s[scores={rend_fallen_base_attack=0}] if data entity @s {HandItems:[{}]} run data merge entity @s {HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:netherite_sword",Count:1b,tag:{Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:sharpness",lvl:4s}]}}]}

execute at @s if entity @e[scores={rend_enemy=1},distance=5..] if data entity @s {HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:netherite_sword",Count:1b,tag:{Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:sharpness",lvl:4s}]}}]} run data merge entity @s {HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:bow",Count:1b,tag:{Unbreakable:1b,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:power",lvl:4s}]}}]}

execute at @s if entity @e[scores={rend_enemy=1},distance=..4] if data entity @s {HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:bow",Count:1b,tag:{Unbreakable:1b,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:power",lvl:4s}]}}]} run data merge entity @s {HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:netherite_sword",Count:1b,tag:{Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:sharpness",lvl:4s}]}}]}

execute if data entity @s[scores={rend_fallen_base_attack=1..}] {HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:netherite_sword",Count:1b,tag:{Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:sharpness",lvl:4s}]}}]} run data merge entity @s {HandItems:[{}]}
